plist:
CFBundleDevelopmentRegion
	$(DEVELOPMENT_LANGUAGE)
	CFBundleDisplayName
	Plant Identifier
	CFBundleExecutable
	$(EXECUTABLE_NAME)
	CFBundleIdentifier
	$(PRODUCT_BUNDLE_IDENTIFIER)
	CFBundleInfoDictionaryVersion
	6.0
	CFBundleName
	plant_identifier_app
	CFBundlePackageType
	APPL
	CFBundleShortVersionString
	$(FLUTTER_BUILD_NAME)
	CFBundleSignature
	????
	CFBundleVersion
	$(FLUTTER_BUILD_NUMBER)
	LSRequiresIPhoneOS
	
	UILaunchStoryboardName
	LaunchScreen
	UIMainStoryboardFile
	Main
	UISupportedInterfaceOrientations
	
		UIInterfaceOrientationPortrait
		UIInterfaceOrientationLandscapeLeft
		UIInterfaceOrientationLandscapeRight
	
	UISupportedInterfaceOrientations~ipad
	
		UIInterfaceOrientationPortrait
		UIInterfaceOrientationPortraitUpsideDown
		UIInterfaceOrientationLandscapeLeft
		UIInterfaceOrientationLandscapeRight
	
	UIViewControllerBasedStatusBarAppearance
	
	CADisableMinimumFrameDurationOnPhone
	
	UIApplicationSupportsIndirectInputEvents
	
	
	
	NSCameraUsageDescription
	This app needs camera access to identify plants by taking photos.
	
	
	NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription
	This app needs photo library access to select plant images for identification.
	
	
	NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription
	This app uses location to provide weather-based plant care recommendations.
	
	
	MinimumOSVersion
	13.0
	
	
	FirebaseCrashlyticsCollectionEnabled
